mapper.insert: insert into user (id, pass, name, email, address, phone, join_date, roll) values (#{id}, md5(#{pass}), #{name}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, now(), 1)
mapper.select: select id, pass, name, email, address, phone, join_date as joinDate, roll from user where id = #{id} and pass = md5(#{pass}) and isDel = 0
